message.body: This play is nuts awesome! Still on for later?
Yup yup. 7pm, at our studio (at front & girard)
Oh cool. Id mainly like to discuss notes today and hear what u have planned. Then tom ot thursday maybe see what things sound like together. U have time?
Sounds good. Hopefully you can see Kenny do the whole show tonight. I'm free most of Thursday.
I'm going to be using a glockenspiel (which is a tiny xylophone)
Cool. Thats great. Im getting all notes together today, most sounds together by thursday
Then we can just hear it after that and adjust /edit. Sound good?
Gawd damn, look at you girl!

I just roll intensly into things once they get to the top of my priority list ya know. Me and kennedy have both mentioned cottage cheese as well. I got new ableton and found an interface this week as well. Yes!
I wanr to rwcord seamus eating doritos for one part.
Haha, oh man...so stoked you're helping us!!!!
Ya know ill do what i can. This is new for me so i just want to keep it pretty simple and keep best of best. :-)
Front and girard, "transmissions" garage. Be there soon
